you know what is the meaning of T2?, T2 mean any hardware faulty, you have to bring back to Apply only for service, no other external party can service your mac mini with T2, meaning Apple can rip you off once again with exorbitant pricing for parts. good luck with T2.

replies.msg:
I think it’s YOU who don’t know what’s the meaning of T2

The Apple T2 Security Chip brings a new level of integration and security to Mac.


The Apple T2 Security Chip is Apple's second-generation, custom silicon for Mac. By redesigning and integrating several controllers found in other Mac computers—such as the System Management Controller, image signal processor, audio controller, and SSD controller—the T2 chip delivers new capabilities to your Mac.
For example, the T2 chip enables a new level of security by including a secure enclave coprocessor that provides the foundation for new encrypted storage and secure boot capabilities. And the chip's image signal processor works with the FaceTime HD camera to enable enhanced tone mapping, improved exposure control, and face-detection–based autoexposure and auto white balance.

d apple打手真係
電話都叫冇得砌、多d自己研發既野
但電腦呢？基本上冇咩自己研發可言但都可以賣咁貴
依家唔係買唔買得起既問題，而係值唔值

you know what is the meaning of T2?, T2 mean any hardware faulty, you have to bring back to Apply only for service, no other external party can service your mac mini with T2, meaning Apple can rip you off once again with exorbitant pricing for parts. good luck with T2.

replies.msg:
In spite of T2 chip, its never a good idea to sevice a mac/any pc by 3rd party unless you can do it on your own then its another story. You still susceptible to being rip off by 3rd party repairer (by mean other then chagring you high price for example). Perhaps someone will take the risk but I wont.

I am not a supporter of T2 chip but I wont blame it for this reason as I wont repair it by myself anyway. But indeed my mac with the chip freeze quite often compare to my older mac.
